channel.title: Old weapon models?
channel.description:
I was browsing the wiki and saw a picture of the old MP5 model and the old SPAS-12 model (with the stock). I personally think they're better than the final models. Any possible way somebody could recreate those? Those models are just sexy.
MP5 ![](upload://8C6bScKiVk3COgBfgeoy7lU3rUH.jpeg)
SPAS-12 ![](upload://rKQw6hKkaieonmfmgDGp4008tUo.jpeg)

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Maksman
item.description:
i found the beta mp5 from smod it has both world and veiw model but doesn’t work in black mesa. the world model even has the stock but has a surpressor which i dont like. the veiw model is animated just like the version for gmod and hl2. its works in gmod i used it with the black mesa grunt and bone merger so it has support for players and npc from what i can see. heres download link if anyone wants to fix it up and or veiw it. https://www.dropbox.com/s/xy2svhldsal3flz/Black%20Mesa%20Leak%20MP5.zip

Read full topic

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Robert_Timecock
item.description:
I love the aesthetics of an unfolded Spas-12 just as much as the next guy, but I imagine with the kind of maneuvering and acrobatics Gordon Freeman is doing, I think he’d have his shotgun folded.

As for the MP5, I agree. The older model definitely looks better.

Read full topic

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Spartan6914
item.description:
M4TT:

I was browsing the wiki and saw a picture of the old MP5 model and the old SPAS-12 model (with the stock). I personally think they’re better than the final models. Any possible way somebody could recreate those? Those models are just sexy.

MP5

SPAS-12

I made a skin pack with the old weapons (mp5, spas-12 folded/unfolded) but the anims aren’t good and the hands are semi-textured.
The pack is here. I just need an animator.

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Dalek
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

Maybe.Depends if I can get a free 3d modeling software where you can export it to source.I made a small start of the Spas 12 during the Xmas break, but I had to cease it since Autodesk called me (I got a pirated version), and asked for me.I luckily said no.To make a long story short, I destroyed my harddisk after the call, and got a new subscription for internet.I got a feeling if I enter the USA I’ll get arrested for pirating, and I know the USA court aint fair and I end up in jail.

Have you tried Blender? It’s free.

Read full topic

item.title: Old weapon models?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
You know, the glock and shotgun look great in BM, but I wish we could shift them over to be more towards the middle of the screen. It would make them look way more like their HL1 counterparts, and look a little more natural too.
